articles.title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 11 Pro Plus 5G launches in Europe at a discount with a pre-order bonus - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Xiaomi has begun offering the Redmi Note 11 Pro Plus 5G in Europe, starting at €379.90. Available in three memory configurations, the Redmi Note 11 Pro Plus 5G has a Dimensity 920 chipset and a 108 MP camera, among other features.
